headline: Altria Expands Beyond Nicotine: Is MO's Strategy Worth Watching?
summary: MO is evaluating non-nicotine and wellness categories through a KT&G collaboration as part of a long-term effort to diversify beyond tobacco.

headline: Jefferies Sees Limited Re-Rating Upside for Philip Morris (PM) in 2026
summary: Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) is included among the 15 Best S&P 500 Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2026. On January 20, Jefferies analyst Edward Mundy moved Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) to Hold from Buy and cut the firm’s price target to $180 from $220. In his note, he said Jefferies sees limited room […]
